name: Shmup (itch) (ChristyLin)
description:
This is an endless runner type of game. The objective is to survive as long as possible while trying to beat your previous high score. You’ll have to dodge or obliterate certain obstacles to survive. Move across the screen by using the WASD or arrow keys and destroy the enemies by pressing space. There were some issues with object interaction and RuntimeError: null function or function signature mismatch error when restarting the game thus you can play again by reloading the game.

Cat: https://www.pixilart.com/art/32-x-32-cat-42e019c236fe77a
